title: Hahaha: Laughters & Funny Voices Pack1
description: Level up your LOLs with “Hahaha: Laughters & Funny Voices Pack1”
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Unlock a world of comical and funny voice sounds with our laughter-packed audio asset! Dive into a treasure trove of chuckles, giggles, and guffaws, perfect for adding character to your games. From youthful snickers to deep laughters, this pack covers the entire laughter spectrum. But that’s not all—discover quirky voices that span kiddish innocence to cartoony zaniness. Whether you’re designing a mischievous sprite or a comical NPC, these sounds will elevate your game to the next level.


Use Cases:

  • Character Expressions
  • Comical Punctuations
  • Interactive Elements
technicalDetails:

  • Tone5_Cartoon = 57
  • Tone6_Cartoon_Fast = 39

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz-24bit + 48kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Loopable: No

Additional: Stereo
